attributes.action: Support the UK ship building yards by insisting that special ships used to build offshore wind farms are built in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the rapid growth in the construction of offshore wind farms, there is a need to buy additional specialist ships necessary to construct each wind turbine. To support the UK ship building industry, the UK government should find a way to ensure that these ships are built in the UK by British companies, rather than being built on the opposite side of the world. Each ship costs £60m to buy. Constructing these locally would help to support and sustain the communities which rely on British ship building
